0100100111001100 1011010011111011 1 -> sum: 1111111011001000, cout: 0
1011101011111100 0100001110011111 0 -> sum: 1111111010011011, cout: 0
0100000101010111 0000100010000011 0 -> sum: 0100100111011010, cout: 0

0010010001100101 1011011000001000 0 -> sum: 1101101001101101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
